00051 #define BUFFER_SIZE 65536

00059 
00060   void process_event(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00061     int32_t error;
00062     const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00063     size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00064     uint32_t offset, len;
00065     if (remaining == 0)
00066       cout << "success" << endl;
00067     else {
00068       while (remaining) {
00069         try {
00070           error = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00071           offset = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00072           len = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00073         }
00074         catch (Exception &e) {
00075           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00076           break;
00077         }
00078         cout << "rejected: offset=" << offset << " span=" << len << " " << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082 
00083 }

00085 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::RangeServerCommandInterpreter(Comm *comm, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, struct sockaddr_in addr, RangeServerClientPtr &range_server_ptr) : m_comm(comm), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr), m_addr(addr), m_range_server_ptr(range_server_ptr), m_cur_scanner_id(-1) {
00086   HqlHelpText::install_range_server_client_text();
00087   return;
00088 }

00090 
00091 void RangeServerCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00092   int error;
00093   TableIdentifier *table = 0;
00094   RangeSpec range;
00095   TableInfo *table_info;
00096   std::string schema_str;
00097   std::string out_str;
00098   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00099   hql_interpreter_state state;
00100   hql_interpreter interp(state);
00101   parse_info<> info;
00102   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00103   ScanBlock scanblock;
00104   int32_t scanner_id;
00105   EventPtr event_ptr;
00106 
00107   info = parse(line.c_str(), interp, space_p);
00108 
00109   if (info.full) {
00110 
00111     // if table name specified, get associated objects
00112     if (state.table_name != "") {
00113       table_info = m_table_map[state.table_name];
00114       if (table_info == 0) {
00115         table_info = new TableInfo(state.table_name);
00116         if ((error = table_info->load(m_hyperspace_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00117           HT_THROW(error, std::string("Problem loading table '") + state.table_name + "'");
00118         m_table_map[state.table_name] = table_info;
00119       }
00120       table = table_info->get_table_identifier();
00121       table_info->get_schema_ptr(schema_ptr);
00122     }
00123 
00124     // if end row is "??", transform it to 0xff 0xff
00125     if (state.range_end_row == "??")
00126       state.range_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00127 
00128     if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE) {
00129       RangeState range_state;
00130 
00131       cout << "TableName  = " << state.table_name << endl;
00132       cout << "StartRow   = " << state.range_start_row << endl;
00133       cout << "EndRow     = " << state.range_end_row << endl;
00134 
00135       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00136       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00137 
00138       range_state.soft_limit = 200000000LL;
00139 
00140       m_range_server_ptr->load_range(m_addr, *table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00141 
00142     }
00143     else if (state.command == COMMAND_UPDATE) {
00144       TestSource *tsource = 0;
00145 
00146       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00147         HT_THROW(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, std::string("Input file '") + state.input_file + "' does not exist");
00148 
00149       tsource = new TestSource(state.input_file, schema_ptr.get());
00150 
00151       uint8_t *send_buf = 0;
00152       size_t   send_buf_len = 0;
00153       DynamicBuffer buf(BUFFER_SIZE);
00154       ByteString key, value;
00155       size_t key_len, value_len;
00156       bool outstanding = false;
00157 
00158       while (true) {
00159 
00160         while (tsource->next(key, value)) {
00161           key_len = key.length();
00162           value_len = value.length();
00163           buf.ensure(key_len + value_len);
00164           buf.add_unchecked(key.ptr, key_len);
00165           buf.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00166           if (buf.fill() > BUFFER_SIZE)
00167             break;
00168         }
00169 
00173         if (buf.fill()) {
00174           std::vector<ByteString> keys;
00175           struct LtByteString ltbs;
00176           const uint8_t *ptr;
00177           size_t len;
00178 
00179           key.ptr = ptr = buf.base;
00180 
00181           while (ptr < buf.ptr) {
00182             keys.push_back(key);
00183             key.next();
00184             key.next();
00185             ptr = key.ptr;
00186           }
00187 
00188           std::sort(keys.begin(), keys.end(), ltbs);
00189 
00190           send_buf = new uint8_t [buf.fill()];
00191           uint8_t *sendp = send_buf;
00192           for (size_t i=0; i<keys.size(); i++) {
00193             key = keys[i];
00194             key.next();
00195             key.next();
00196             len = key.ptr - keys[i].ptr;
00197             memcpy(sendp, keys[i].ptr, len);
00198             sendp += len;
00199           }
00200           send_buf_len = sendp - send_buf;
00201           buf.clear();
00202         }
00203         else
00204           send_buf_len = 0;
00205 
00206         if (outstanding) {
00207           if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00208             HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00209           process_event(event_ptr);
00210         }
00211 
00212         outstanding = false;
00213 
00214         if (send_buf_len > 0) {
00215           StaticBuffer mybuf(send_buf, send_buf_len);
00216           m_range_server_ptr->update(m_addr, *table, mybuf, &sync_handler);
00217           outstanding = true;
00218         }
00219         else
00220           break;
00221       }
00222 
00223       if (outstanding) {
00224         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00225           HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00226         process_event(event_ptr);
00227       }
00228 
00229     }
00230     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER) {
00231       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00232       RowInterval ri;
00233 
00234       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00235       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00236 
00240       scan_spec.row_limit = state.scan.limit;
00241       scan_spec.max_versions = state.scan.max_versions;
00242       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.columns.size(); i++)
00243         scan_spec.columns.push_back(state.scan.columns[i].c_str());
00244 
00245       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00246         if (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start > state.scan.row_intervals[i].end ||
00247             (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start == state.scan.row_intervals[i].end &&
00248              !(state.scan.row_intervals[i].start_inclusive || state.scan.row_intervals[i].end_inclusive)))
00249           HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "Bad row range");
00250         ri.start = (state.scan.row_intervals[i].start == "") ? ""
00251           : state.scan.row_intervals[i].start.c_str();
00252         ri.start_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].start_inclusive;
00253         ri.end = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end.c_str();
00254         ri.end_inclusive = state.scan.row_intervals[i].end_inclusive;
00255         scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(ri);
00256       }
00257 
00258       scan_spec.time_interval.first  = state.scan.start_time;
00259       scan_spec.time_interval.second = state.scan.end_time;
00260       scan_spec.return_deletes = state.scan.return_deletes;
00261 
00264       m_range_server_ptr->create_scanner(m_addr, *table, range, scan_spec, scanblock);
00265 
00266       m_cur_scanner_id = scanblock.get_scanner_id();
00267 
00268       ByteString key, value;
00269 
00270       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00271         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00272 
00273       if (scanblock.eos())
00274         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00275 
00276     }
00277     else if (state.command == COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK) {
00278 
00279       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00280         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00281           HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID, "No currently open scanner");
00282         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00283         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00284       }
00285       else
00286         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00287 
00290       m_range_server_ptr->fetch_scanblock(m_addr, scanner_id, scanblock);
00291 
00292       ByteString key, value;
00293 
00294       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00295         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00296 
00297       if (scanblock.eos())
00298         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00299 
00300     }
00301     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER) {
00302 
00303       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00304         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00305           return;
00306         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00307         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00308       }
00309       else
00310         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00311 
00312       m_range_server_ptr->destroy_scanner(m_addr, scanner_id);
00313 
00314     }
00315     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_RANGE) {
00316 
00317       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00318       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00319 
00320       m_range_server_ptr->drop_range(m_addr, *table, range, &sync_handler);
00321 
00322       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00323         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00324 
00325     }
00326     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN) {
00327       m_range_server_ptr->replay_begin(m_addr, false, &sync_handler);  // fix me!!  added metadata boolean
00328       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00329         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00330     }
00331     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_LOG) {
00332       cout << "Not implemented." << endl;
00333     }
00334     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT) {
00335       m_range_server_ptr->replay_commit(m_addr, &sync_handler);
00336       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00337         HT_THROW(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00338     }
00339     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00340       const char **text = HqlHelpText::Get(state.str);
00341       if (text) {
00342         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00343           cout << text[i] << endl;
00344       }
00345       else
00346         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00347     }
00348     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHUTDOWN) {
00349       m_range_server_ptr->shutdown(m_addr);
00350     }
00351     else
00352       HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "unsupported command");
00353   }
00354   else
00355     HT_THROW(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, std::string("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00356 }

00359 
00363 void
00364 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::display_scan_data(const ByteString &bskey,
00365     const ByteString &value, SchemaPtr &schema_ptr) {
00366   Key key(bskey);
00367   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00368 
00369   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00370     cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " DELETE" << endl;
00371   }
00372   else {
00373     if (key.column_family_code > 0) {
00374       cf = schema_ptr->get_column_family(key.column_family_code);
00375       if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00376         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << key.column_qualifier << " DELETE" << endl;
00377       else {
00378         cout << key.timestamp << " " << key.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << key.column_qualifier;
00379         cout << endl;
00380       }
00381     }
00382     else {
00383       cerr << "Bad column family (" << (int)key.column_family_code << ") for row key " << key.row;
00384       cerr << endl;
00385     }
00386   }
00387 }
